articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Monday provided field guidance to the Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage in the run-up to a ceremony for their completion.
					 Watching the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il displayed on the front wall of the Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage, he noted with great pleasure that they were prominently displayed with due respect and that children came to move into new houses under blessings from Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 How pleased they would have been if they had seen palace-like new buildings for children, he noted, adding that it has become possible to realize the lifetime wishes of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who were always concerned for the orphans.
					
					 Recalling that he proposed having a tape-cutting ceremony on June 1, International Children's Day, by giving a good finishing touch to the project during his visit to the baby home and orphanage last April, he said he could keep the promise with the children as soldier-builders successfully wound up the construction of the buildings into the structures reflecting the will and desire of the people in a short span of time true to the Party's intention. He appreciated the great efforts made by them. 
					
					 He proposed letting children cut tape at the ceremony so that they might always remember this day even after they have grown up, adding how pleasant the President and Kim Jong Il would have been if they had seen those children cutting the tape. 
					
					 He went round the baby home and orphanage to learn in detail about the preparations for their operation.
					
					 He was satisfied with the fact that the soldier-builders and officials of relevant fields have perfectly completed the project and made thorough preparations for the operation of the baby home and orphanage. 
					
					 He gave instructions which would serve as guidelines for successfully operating them.
					
					 He said that the Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage look very nice, adding such splendid palace for children could be hardly found in any other part of the world. He noted with pleasure that this is a proud structure eloquently and strikingly demonstrating the advantages of the socialist system under which the party and the state take care of the orphans in a responsible manner.
					
					 Whenever such edifices as the Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage appear one after another, this adds brilliance to the whole country and will please all Korean people, he said, stressing that this is a true picture of the Korean-style socialist system which capitalism can neither imitate nor imagine. 
					
					 How gratifying we feel after providing the orphans with excellent cradle, true to the intentions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he noted, adding the orphans would surely follow the party and country as their real father and mother and happily and cheerfully grow to be reliable pillars of the country. Thinking of this helps harden our determination to work harder for the sake of the younger generation day by day and spare nothing for them, he emphasized.
					
					 Saying the appearance of the baby home and orphanage added to the precious treasures of the country, a happy event in Kangwon Province, he instructed officials to hold the ceremony for their completion with splendor.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il and Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Construction of Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage Completed
articles.content:
Construction of Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage Completed
 Wonsan, June 2 (KCNA) -- Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage were newly built in the DPRK.
					 They have all conditions and environment for upbringing, education and living: nursing rooms, education rooms, children's libraries, rooms for observing nature, rooms for playing with intelligence toys, amusement rooms, wading pools, bathrooms, barbers' and clinics.
					
					 A ceremony of completion of the construction of the baby home and orphanage took place on Monday with splendor.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Han Sang Jun, chairman of the Kangwon Provincial People's Committee, commanding officers and soldier-builders of units which took part in the construction, officials, employees and children of the baby home and orphanage and officials of party and power bodies and relevant fields and other people in the province and Wonsan City.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, made an address.
					
					 The construction of the modern Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage under the loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un for children made it possible to give fuller play to the advantages of the Korean-style socialist system that capitalism can never imitate nor possess, he said.
					
					 He called upon nurses and educators to become children's parents and good educators for bringing children up so that they can enjoy a happy life.
					
					 Soldier-builders and officials of the baby home and orphanage stretched a tape and orphans cut it.
					
					 They went inside amid warm applauses.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' Moves for Biochemical War Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' Moves for Biochemical War Denounced 
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Side Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind the GIs' Massacres on Monday made public a statement in connection with the recent disclosure of the U.S. secret introduction of active anthrax germs into the Osan U.S. air force base in south Korea. 
					 Now opposition parties and civic and social organizations of south Korea deplore the reality of south Korea where the authorities are taking a hands-off approach towards the U.S. introducing such active anthrax germs into south Korea anytime without any prior notice. They are strongly demanding the probe into the truth behind the case and the U.S. and Park Geun Hye group's apology and abrogation of the unequal south Korea-U.S. SOFA. 
					
					 Much upset by this, the U.S. is vociferating about "total disposal of it," "apology" and "responsible step" while claiming it was to "cope with the north's attack by anthrax germs" in a crafty bid to calm down the south Korean people's anti-Americanism.
					
					 The North Side Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind the GIs' Massacres brands the acts of the U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors' backing it to threaten the existence of the Korean nation by introducing biochemical weapons including anthrax germs into south Korea at random as an unpardonable crime against humanity and the nation and bitterly denounces it on behalf of all Koreans, the spokesman said, and went on:
					
					 The disclosure of the U.S. introduction of anthrax germs into south Korea clearly revealed the fact that it has so far systematically stepped up preparations for a biochemical war against the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists established germ institutes equipped with biochemical weapon lab facilities including anthrax germs in the U.S. military bases and other parts of south Korea and have conducted tests on germs weapons spreading malignant infectious diseases with high mortality. They have massively introduced chemical weapons and poisonous chemical substance including binary chemical weapon and defoliant and regarded the south Korean people as guinea pigs for testing their efficiency. 
					
					 The U.S. has staged madcap exercises for a biochemical war aimed to devastate the whole land of Korea and exterminate all Koreans, while conducting horrible tests on south Koreans. The Park Geun Hye group is, however, working hard to do harm to the compatriots in the north and back the U.S. master, while keeping mum about the above-said crimes.  This group is hordes of the worst traitors to the nation. 
					
					 The south Korean people cannot escape from the present misfortunes and sufferings and the Korean nation cannot be free from horrible disaster to be caused by nuclear and biochemical wars as long as the U.S. imperialist aggressors are present in south Korea and their servants Park Geun Hye group is allowed to stay there.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Italian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Italian President
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Sergio Mattarella, president of the Republic of Italy, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow strong in various fields, wishing the president and people of Italy success in their work for the development of the country.

articles.title: Burkina Faso President Wishes to See Peaceful Reunification of Korea
articles.content:
Burkina Faso President Wishes to See Peaceful Reunification of Korea
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Ambassador Hong Son Phyo presented his credentials to Michel Kafando, president of Burkina Faso, on May 22.
					 The president said that the relations between the two countries have a long-standing tradition, wishing Korea would be reunified in a peaceful way in the interests of all Koreans.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Italian Personages
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Italian Personages
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy, and his party.
					 Antonio Razzi handed the gift over an official concerned Monday.

articles.title: Secretary General of Commission for Foreign Affairs of Senate of Italy Returns Home
articles.content:
Secretary General of Commission for Foreign Affairs of Senate of Italy Returns Home
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy, and his party returned home on Tuesday.

articles.title: New Posters Produced
articles.content:
New Posters Produced 
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- New posters have been produced in the DPRK to dynamically arouse all people to a campaign against drought.
					 Poster bearing slogan "Let's wage a dynamic struggle against drought through a mass campaign!" ardently calls on all people to turn out in a drive to secure water.
					
					 Poster "All for a campaign against drought!" encourages the agricultural workers to conduct an intensive drive for watering all fields by operating all equipment and facilities while securing more water resources.

articles.title: Statements of Spokesmen for Policy Department of NDC and FM of DPRK Distributed as UNSC Official Document
articles.content:
Statements of Spokesmen for Policy Department of NDC and FM of DPRK Distributed as UNSC Official Document
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- A statement issued by a spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK clarifying its principled stand as regards the U.S. and its allies' reckless action of taking issue with the DPRK's successful test-fire of ballistic missile from a strategic submarine and a statement issued by a spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK denouncing the U.S. secretary of State for letting loose a string of reckless remarks slandering the DPRK were distributed as UN Security Council's official document S/2015/365 on May 28.

articles.title: New Feature Film Produced
articles.content:
New Feature Film Produced
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- A feature film "Rice Plant Flower" was produced in the DPRK.
					 The film depicts an agitator of a cooperative farm whom leader Kim Jong Il put forward as a model of the rural party primary information official in the era of Songun. It makes a truthful artistic representation of the ideological and moral traits of the heroine who distinguishes herself in implementing the party's policy of bringing about a radical turn in agriculture and mass line.
					
					 The film emphasizes that only one who devotes oneself with warm tenderness can motivate the minds of masses and successfully carry out the revolutionary task given by the party.

articles.title: Traditional Costumes Encouraged in DPRK
articles.content:
Traditional Costumes Encouraged in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Men's traditional jacket and trousers are now popular in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In this regard, Kim Myong Sil, section chief of the Clothing Institute under the Ministry of Food and Consumer Goods Industries, said:
					
					 The Korean jacket and trousers have a long history.
					
					 In the past, the Korean men used to put on the costume in normal days, to say nothing of holidays and wedding ceremonies.
					
					 The institute has striven to develop the costume to suit the aesthetic sense of the times while keeping alive its traditional features.
					
					 It made various designs for the costume in cooperation with Pyongyang Jang Chol Gu University of Commerce, Pyongyang University of Fine Arts and the Korean Folklore Museum.
					
					 The institute standardized the costume's designs in accordance with physical features, ages and seasons.

articles.title: Minju Joson Dismisses S. Korean Puppet Regime's False Propaganda
articles.content:
Minju Joson Dismisses S. Korean Puppet Regime's False Propaganda
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet News 1 on May 28 aired a false report that the DPRK's patrol craft and fishing boat collided with a Russian submarine in the waters off the eastern coast of Korea last year.
					 The conservative puppet media including Chosun Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo kicked off false propaganda about "starvation" in a bid to hurt the DPRK's dignity and Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This sparks off surging resentment of public at home and abroad as it was anti-reunification and treacherous act of throwing a wet blanket over the desire of reunification of the Koreans and escalating the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 What matters is that Park Geun Hye and her group were behind the smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 Not only her yes men but reporters and anchor persons and those who claim to be experts are busy echoing confrontation maniac Park Geun Hye's reckless remarks in quest of rewards and successful career. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye and her yes men are running the whole gamut of invectives making profound confusing of right and wrong and falsifying facts in a bid to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system. This is little short of digging their own graves. The same fate awaits the puppet conservative media persons selling off elementary conscience and perpetrating heinous acts of treachery for a petty amount of money.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will consider those who take a zealous part in the smear campaign against the DPRK as the primary target and mete out severest punishment to them no matter who they are, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Japan's Militarization Leads to Its Self-Destruction: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Japan's Militarization Leads to Its Self-Destruction: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Former Japanese Prime Minister Murayama in his recent  lecture expressed serious concern about the "positive pacifism" touted by the present chief executive, saying that the present government is going to reignite a war. Experts including Japanese military critic Maeta claim it is hypocrisy to assert that Japan  will not be involved in a war and the tightening of the Japan-U.S. alliance would arouse the caution of the neighboring countries and thus give them a pretext for arms race and, furthermore, invite a preemptive strike at Japan, 
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson says: The present Japanese government is mulling passing the draft amendment to a law related with the national security under the pretext of the "positive pacifism" and, furthermore, revising the constitution. These moves are, in essence, aimed at legalizing the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense".
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The core element of Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" is the attack of the "Self-Defence Forces".
					
					 Needless to say, Japan's armed attack inevitably invites the rival side's military retaliation and this will spill over to a war.
					
					 The present Japanese government is taking much pain to calm down its people with a string of unreasonable remarks. This is designed to clear all the legal obstacles lying in the way of its militarization and launch of fresh overseas invasion with the U.S. backing come what may.
					
					 It should ponder over why its people strongly oppose a war and express concern about a possible preemptive strike at Japan.
					
					 If Japan having a history of aggression woven with all sorts of crimes reignites a reckless war of aggression with the U.S. backing, it will put its whole land at peril, warns the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces' Frantic War Drills Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces' Frantic War Drills Assailed
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK-targeted war exercises now under way in south Korea is a root cause that escalated tensions on the Korean peninsula and pushed the north-south ties to a catastrophe, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It is an invariable scenario of the puppet conservative forces to do harm to the fellow countrymen in the north by force in collusion with outsiders, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The present puppet forces have staged all forms of large-scale war exercises including Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian in south Korea every year despite unanimous protest and denunciation by all the Koreans in order to achieve their aim by posing constant threats to the DPRK through ceaseless war exercises with the U.S.
					
					 The above-said war maneuvers are an open challenge to all the Koreans aspiring after the improvement of the north-south ties and the peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia as they are dangerous saber-rattling aimed at a preemptive attack on the DPRK to all intents and purposes in the light of their scope, programs and intensity.
					
					 As the south Korean puppet forces have gone crazy in their moves for a new war together with the U.S., being obsessed with their foolish ambition for invading the DPRK, the north-south ties have plunged into the worst deadlock with the opportunity for their improvement lost.
					
					 The puppet forces are now slandering the measures taken by the DPRK to increase national capabilities for self-defence in the face of the hostile forces' reckless aggression moves as "provocation" and "threat", and have gone desperate in their moves to provoke the DPRK politically and militarily in collusion with outsiders under that pretext.
					
					 But with neither sophism nor sleight of hand can the puppet forces deceive the public opinion at home and abroad nor can they cover up their criminal acts of having bedeviled the north-south ties and wantonly harassed peace and security on the Korean peninsula through their war moves against the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. for Misusing Space for War of Aggression
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. for Misusing Space for War of Aggression 
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. squanders a fabulous amount of fund for developing space, considering it as a lever for realizing its domination scheme, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary. 
					 Referring to the U.S. air force's recent launch of unmanned spaceship X-37B, the commentary goes on:
					
					 Military experts comment the spaceship can either be a reconnaissance plane or a drone fighter-bomber that can operate in space. Some countries claim that the spaceship can be a space plane for transporting weapons manufactured and launched by the U.S. air force.
					
					 The U.S. air force is now facilitating the development of hypersonic weapon capable of hitting any target in the world within an hour. It is reportedly planning to test-fire in near future new type hypersonic missile also known as rocket propelled gliding weapon on which it is now working.
					
					 This is an illegal act in contravention of international law on space which calls for using space for the promotion of human wellbeing and a serious challenge to humankind's desire.
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. is incriminating the DPRK for launching satellites for peaceful purposes while deliberately launching its space weapons in breach of international law.
					
					 The U.S. ever-more undisguised space militarization is sparking off new global arms race, gravely threatening the right of humankind to existence. 
					
					 News analysts say with concern that the U.S. hypersonic missiles now under development may cause accidental retaliatory strike and even a nuclear war as it may be misinterpreted as a nuclear weapon.
					
					 The U.S. should never be allowed to turn space into a war theatre for world domination.
					
					 The U.S. warmongers would be well advised to behave themselves as they misuse space for a war of aggression, being buoyed by their ambition for world domination, urges the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Demand Authorities Probe Truth behind Introduction of Anthrax Germs
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Demand Authorities Probe Truth behind Introduction of Anthrax Germs 
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations of different social standings staged protest actions in the wake of the disclosure of the U.S. secret introduction of anthrax germs in south Korea.
					 The south Korean Green Federation in a statement on May 28 said that the introduction of anthrax germs is a serious matter directly affecting the life and security of the south Korean people but nobody was aware its whole course.
					
					 The statement urged the south Korean and U.S. authorities to probe the truth behind the introduction of anthrax germs in detail, make an official apology for it and take a step to prevent the recurrence.
					
					 The Bar Association for Democratic Society issued a statement on May 28 in denunciation of the U.S. introduction of anthrax germs.
					
					 The statement accused the U.S. of failing to clarify when anthrax germs were introduced and their adverse impact on the south Korean people.
					
					 The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in a commentary on the same day urged the regime to clarify how materials for mass destruction including anthrax germs and weapons were introduced and if there were any quarantine and control in the course of their introduction.
					
					  The Bar Association for Democratic Society and civic and public organizations held a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on May 29. They declared that people from all walks of life would stage mass actions outside the U.S. military bases in order to have the truth behind the introduction of anthrax germs thoroughly probed and those who are responsible for it punished and prevent the recurrence of the crime.

articles.title: Judgment of Group of Traitors in S. Korea Called for by Koreans in U.S.
articles.content:
Judgment of Group of Traitors in S. Korea Called for by Koreans in U.S.
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. issued a statement on May 29 calling upon all compatriots to unite close and judge the puppet group in south Korea and turn out in the struggle for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the nation.
					 The statement underscored the need for all compatriots to intensify the actions to usher in the second June 15 era of reunification on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the liberation of Korea and the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It called upon all Koreans to judge the "government" opposed to reunification in order to fulfill the mission of the times to pave a wide avenue to independent reunification by their concerted efforts.
					
					 It is impossible to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification, much less of ensuring the living of the people, as long as the Park Geun Hye regime is allowed to stay.

articles.title: Protest Actions Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest Actions Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Over 40 organizations of different circles of south Korea held a press conference outside the puppet Defense Ministry on May 29 in protest against military authorities' talks between the U.S., Japan and south Korea. They included the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, Solidarity for Progress, Confederation of Trade Unions, Federation of University Students, Buddhist Peace Solidarity and the Missionary Solidarity Council of Christian Society.
					 The organizations recalled at the press conference that the defense ministerial talks would discuss the deployment of THAAD in south Korea, conclusion of a military agreement with Japan, etc.
					
					 This will lead to the building of a triangular missile shield and the appearance of military alliance, turning south Korea into an advanced base for carrying out the U.S. strategy for laying a siege to Northeast Asia and totally blocking the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula, they noted.
					
					 They demanded the authorities oppose the deployment of THAAD, halt the discussion on the conclusion of a military agreement with Japan and opt for peaceful reunification. 
					
					 At the end of the conference the members of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification staged a demonstration against THAAD deployment and a peace action.
					
					 Similar conferences and protest actions took place in Pusan, Taegu, Kwangju, North Jolla Province and other areas of south Korea.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Conniving at U.S. Introduction of Anthrax Germs
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Conniving at U.S. Introduction of Anthrax Germs
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Song Mi. chairperson of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China, issued an article on June 1 in the wake of the disclosure of the U.S. secret introduction of anthrax germs into south Korea.
					 The article pointed to the recent disclosure of the fact that the U.S. introduced active anthrax germs into the Osan U.S. air force base in south Korea. It went on:
					
					 The U.S. had already set up facilities for testing anthrax germs in the Osan U.S. air force base and has made sustainable preparations for germ warfare against the Koreans.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime talkative about "nuclear threat from the north" whenever a chance presents itself is not in a position to confirm the U.S. introduction of anthrax germs into south Korea, which poses a direct threat to the life of the nation, far from making an inspection bound to the unequal SOFA.
					
					 If all the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad do not disclose the criminal moves of the Park Geun Hye group to bring clouds of a war to hang over the Korean peninsula by relying on the U.S., the chieftain of aggression, and fail to stage a nation-wide struggle to cope with it, the peace of the country and the life of the nation will be exposed to permanent threat.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held in Kyrgyzstan, India
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held in Kyrgyzstan, India
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the feats of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Kyrgyzstan and India on May 28 to mark the 51st anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Present there were public figures and other people in those countries. 
					
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan, said Kim Jong Il further strengthened the WPK to be experienced, tested and invincible party united on the basis of the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, the Juche idea. 
					
					 He praised Kim Jong Il as a distinguished statesman and tender-hearted father of the people as he led socialist Korea one victory after another, overcoming all difficulties with the might of the Juche idea. 
					
					 S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, said that he performed great exploits by leading the WPK for a long period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Party-building Exploits Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Party-building Exploits Praised by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried articles to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The Indian newspaper Awaking on May 26 carried an article titled "Noteworthy event in history of WPK". 
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il performed undying exploits while leading the WPK for decades, the article went on:
					
					 From the beginning of his work at the WPK Central Committee he paid great attention to the unity of the whole party in thought and purpose and made sure that the whole party is thoroughly modeled on the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, the Juche idea, and turned the WPK into an ideologically pure entity, an integral organization and the party which achieved the unity of actions. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il's party-building exploits are part of the important legacies he left for the country and its people and the ever-lasting foundation guaranteeing the eternal prospect and victory of the WPK. 
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Dainik Probat on May 21 carried an article titled "For the people". 
					
					 It said that Kim Jong Il fully demonstrated his personality as a popular statesman for nearly five decades since he started work at the WPK Central Committee on June 19, 1964. 
					
					 His politics was based on love and trust, the article said, adding that the Korean people praise him as the tender-hearted father as he devoted his all to the people. 
					
					 The Egyptian paper Al-Misaiya on May 25 carried an article titled "Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il and Korea Today". 
					
					 The article said that the DPRK is vigorously advancing to be a socialist thriving nation despite immeasurable difficulties and ordeals and it would be unthinkable without his Songun politics.

articles.title: British Body Terms U.S. Chief Culprit of Massacre in Kwangju of South Korea
articles.content:
British Body Terms U.S. Chief Culprit of Massacre in Kwangju of South Korea
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- An article was posted by the British Group for the Study of Songun Politics on its website on May 20 on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising in south Korea.
					 The article said:
					
					 35 years ago, the south Korean puppet army brutally massacred the Kwangju uprisers who turned out in a struggle against the Chun Doo Hwan military fascist junta.
					
					 Then who was behind the south Korean military fascist junta?
					
					 Some historic records, unable to deny the truth behind the massacre in Kwangju, explain that the massacre was perpetrated by some extreme forces within the puppet army after being hurled into the operation for quelling the resistance.
					
					 Some other historians also assert that the U.S. had nothing to do with the massacre.
					
					 However, one must not forget the fact that troops of the south Korean puppet army could not be hurled into an operation in Kwangju without an order of the commander of the U.S. forces present in south Korea as its right to operation even in peace time was exercised by Washington.
					
					  Moreover, Chun Doo Hwan was a pro-U.S. military fascist who served the U.S. in the Vietnamese war.
					
					  When the Kwangju Popular Uprising erupted, the U.S. held an emergency meeting and took an urgent measure to intensify military support for the Chun Doo Hwan clique.
					
					 Pursuant to it, the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea gave an order to the puppet army to quench the uprising in Kwangju.
					
					 The U.S. brought huge forces to the vicinity of south Korea to support the operation.
					
					 All facts clearly prove that the U.S. imperialists were behind the Kwangju massacre, in actuality.

articles.title: DPRK's Steps for Bolstering up Its Capability for Self-defence Supported by British Bodies
articles.content:
DPRK's Steps for Bolstering up Its Capability for Self-defence Supported by British Bodies
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK released a joint statement on May 20 in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission declared in a statement that the DPRK's test of SLBM was an entirely just measure for bolstering up capability for self-defence and a legitimate exercise of its sovereignty.
					
					 The DPRK explored a new path in the development of strategic weapons by succeeding in the submarine-based ballistic missile launch.
					
					 This success is a proud fruition of Marshal Kim Jong Un's Songun (army-first) revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Progressive and revolutionary people in the world are pleased with the success made by socialist Korea.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, Japan and the south Korean puppet forces should bear in mind the warning served by the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter to Chongryon Introduced in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter to Chongryon Introduced in Nigeria 
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on May 26 posted on its internet homepage the full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's letter "Let Us Usher in a New Heyday of the Movement of Koreans in Japan True to the Intention of the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il" to Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan) and the Koreans resident in Japan on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of Chongryon's founding. 
					 The letter, published on May 25, Juche 104 (2015), said Chongryon which was formed and led by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il has covered a glorious path of development for the past six decades by performing great exploits before the country and the nation.
					
					 It indicates the tasks for bringing about a fresh turn in the movement of the Koreans resident in Japan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan en visperas de inauguracion
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan en visperas de inauguracion
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el dia primero en el terreno el hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan en visperas de inauguracion.
					Mirando los retratados sonrientes del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, colocados al frente de los edificios, el dijo con satisfaccion que los retratos se habian puestos con limpieza y consideracion y que los huerfanos pudieran mudar a nueva casa bajo la bendicion de los lideres.
					
					El Presidente y el Dirigente se alegrarian mucho si los hubieran visto, apunto y agrego que asi puede realizar el deseo de ellos que prestaban siempre atencion para los ninos.
					
					Durante su recorrido por alli hecho en pasado abril, exhorto a los constructores militar a terminar bien las obras y realizar el dia primero de junio la ceremonia inaugural, recordo y elogio los esfuerzos de ellos que en un corto plazo cumplieron satisfactoriamente la tarea dada por el partido levantando los edificios como creacion arquitectonica que refleja la voluntad y el deseo del pueblo, diciendo que asi se puede cumplir la promesa hecha con los ninos.
					
					Hagamos que los ninos corten la cinta en el acto de inauguracion, senalo y anadio que ellos no olvidaran en toda su vida aquel dia de entrada en su casa cortando con su mano pequena la cinta de inauguracion y destaco que los lideres se sentiran muy contentos al verlos.
					
					Dando revista a varios puntos del hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan, el hizo detallado conocimiento de los preparativos de gestion.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los constructores militares y los funcionarios de ramas interesadas hayan culminado la obra y hecho con escrupulosidad los preparativos.
					
					El Mariscal dio instrucciones que sirven de guia para la administracion del hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan.
					
					Dijo con gran satisfaccion que no habra mas en el mundo el palacio infantil tan maravilloso como este hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan y agrego que esta creacion orgullosa manifiesta de manera visual y elocuente la superioridad del regimen socialista de nuestro pais donde el Partido y el Estado atienden totalmente a los huerfanos.
					
					Cada vez que se hayan levantado las construcciones como hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan, todo el pueblo se pone muy contento, dijo y continuo que esto es el aspecto verdadero del regimen socialista a nuestro estilo que el capitalismo nunca puede imitarlo ni inventarlo.
					
					Dijo que se preparo un buen hogar para los huerfanos en acato al proposito de los grandes Lideres y agrego que el mismo tiene la firme decision de trabajar mucho y dedicar todo  lo suyo para las generaciones venideras, al imaginar que los huerfanos apoyaran al Partido y el Estado considerandolos como sus padres y se formaran como competentes trabajadores  del pais.
					
					El Mariscal senalo que se aumento un nuevo tesoro precioso de la patria y la provincia de Kangwon acoge una gran fiesta, gracias a la inauguracion del hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan, y ordeno realizar con solemnidad la ceremonia de inauguracion.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il y Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Inaugurados hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan
articles.content:
Inaugurados hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan
Wonsan, 2 de junio (ACNC) -- Fueron inaugurados el hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Alli estan dispuestos en el maximo nivel todas las condiciones y el ambiente necesarios para la crianza y la educacion de los huerfanos inclusive las salas de crianza y educacion, lectura infantil, observacion de la naturaleza, juegos intelectuales, recreos, piscina, bano, barberia y sala de la asistencia medica.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia primero con solemnidad la ceremonia de inauguracion.
					
					Estuvieron presentes Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, el presidente del Comite Popular de la Provincia de Kangwon, Han Sang Jun, los comandantes y constructores militares de unidades participantes en la construccion, huerfanos, funcionarios y empleados del hospicio y orfanato, funcionarios de los organismos del Partido y el Poder y de la rama correspondiente y trabajadores de dicha provincia y ciudad.
					
					La palabra de inauguracion estuvo a cargo de Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC.
					
					El orador senalo que el hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan construidos como palacio de ninos gracias al amor al futuro del Mariscal Kim Jong Un es la creacion orgullosa que manifiesta con elocuencia la superioridad del socialismo a estilo coreano que el capitalismo nunca puede inventarla ni imitarla.
					
					Y exhorto a las educadoras del hospicio y orfanato a criar sanos y joviales a los huerfanos siendo padres verdaderos y educadoras excelentes.
					
					Tendieron la cinta de inauguracion los constructores militares y los funcionarios del hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan y la cortaron huerfanos.
					
					Siendo objeto de aplausos de los participantes, los huerfanos entraron en sus hogares de amor.

articles.title: Direccion nortena de Jonminthukwi denuncia maniobras de EE.UU. y titeres surcoreanos  para provocar guerra bioquimica
articles.content:
Direccion nortena de Jonminthukwi denuncia maniobras de EE.UU. y titeres surcoreanos  para provocar guerra bioquimica
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la direccion nortena de Jonminthukwi (Comite Pannacional de Averiguacion Especial para Esclarecer Verdaderos Aspectos de Crimenes de Tropas Norteamericanas) hizo publica el dia primero una declaracion de condena a EE.UU. que introdujo en secreto los bacilos de antracosis vivos en la base de sus fuerzas aereas en Osan del Sur de Corea.
					Ahora, los partidos opositores y las entidades civiles y sociales de diferentes estratos surcoreanos deploran la realidad de que el gobierno titere se encuentra sin tomar las medidas aunque EE.UU. los introduce en cualquier momento sin avisar sobre el respecto. Y demandan fuertemente el esclarecimiento de la verdad del caso, la disculpa de Estados Unidos y los compinches de Park Geun-hye y la abolicion del "acuerdo administrativo" Sur de Corea -EE.UU., senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Inquietado ante tal realidad, EE.UU. habla de su "exclusion completa", la "excusa" y las "medidas responsables", mientras se porta astutamente para apaciguar el sentimiento antiyanqui de los surcoreanos disparateando que eso fue para "hacer frente a la ofensiva de bacilo de antracosis del Norte (de Corea)".
					
					La direccion nortena de Jonminthukwi las condena en nombre de todos los connacionales calificando de actos criminales antieticos y antinacionales jamas intolerables las maquinaciones del imperio que amenaza la vida de la nacion coreana al introducir a su antojo en el suelo surcoreano los artefactos bioquimicos incluyendo el bacilo de antracosis y de la banda traidora titere que lo defiende. 
					
					Con el presente caso se puso al desnudo el hecho de que el imperio yanqui ha venido preparando sistematicamente para la guerra bioquimica contra la RPDC.
					
					El imperio yanqui instalo en sus bases radicadas en el suelo surcoreano y otros lugares los institutos bacteriologicos dotados de las instalaciones de ensayo de armas bioquimicas y realizo las pruebas de esas armas propagantes de los germenes de alta mortalidad. E introdujo en masas en el territorio surcoreano las armas quimicas y las sustancias quimicas toxicas y tomo a los surcoreanos como objeto de prueba de su eficacia.
					
					Son el grupo de traidores de la nacion los compinches de Park que no dicen ni una palabra a su amo gringo que se entrega desesperadamente a los entrenamientos de guerra bioquimica capaz de devastar a todo el territorio coreano y exterminar a toda la nacion y desarrolla los ensayos horribles contra la poblacion surcoreana, pero denigran a su connacional y amparan a su amo norteamericano.
					
					Al dejar intacto a los agresores yanquis y su sirvienta banda de Park, la poblacion surcoreana nunca se liberara de la desgracia y el sufrimiento de hoy ni evitara la nacion coreana  la calamidad deplorable de la guerra nuclear y la bioquimica.

articles.title: Nueva pelicula coreana "Flor de arroz"
articles.content:
Nueva pelicula coreana "Flor de arroz"
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ACNC) -- Los Estudios Cinematograficos de Corea produjeron nueva pelicula de ficcion "Flor de arroz".
					La pelicula, cuya protagonista real es una agitadora de una granja cooperativa a quien el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presento como modelo de propagandista basica de la organizacion del Partido en el campo de la epoca del Songun, muestra con las escenas artisticas los rasgos ideologicos y espirituales de la protagonista que sobresalio en la materializacion de la orientacion del Partido en materia de la revolucion agricola y la linea de masas.
					
					La pelicula ensena que uno puede comunicarse con las masas y cumplir bien la mision revolucionaria asumida ante el Partido, solo cuando dedique todo lo suyo con cordiales sentimientos humanos.

articles.title: Editadas nuevas pancartas en RPDC
articles.content:
Editadas nuevas pancartas en RPDC
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fueron creados los afiches que estimulan a todo el pueblo coreano a la campana para prevenir la sequia.
					  La pancarta "!Desarrollemos energicamente la campana por prevenir la seguia con el movimiento masivo!" llama a todo el pueblo a levantarse en la campana para asegurar el agua.
					
					  El afiche "!Todos a la campana por prevenir la seguia!" estimula a los trabajadores agricolas a asegurar mas el fuente de agua y realizar concentradamente el riego y el rociamiento en todas las parcelas movilizando todos los equipos e instalaciones.
